relevant_findings.general: In moderate distress, able to relate history
relevant_findings.heent: Tongue is parched/cracked, mild sinus tenderness over forehead and retro-orbital tenderness, dark circles around eyes
relevant_findings.neck: Nontender supple neck, no lymphadenopathy, no jugular venous distension
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.lung: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles
relevant_findings.abdomen: Positive ___ sign, obese, tender in right upper quadrant, not tender in other quadrants, positive bowel sounds in all quadrants
relevant_findings.extremities: Dark brown macular spots in shins and ankles bilaterally, no cyanosis, clubbing or edema, moving all four extremities with purpose
